I Will Pour Out My Spirit (Acts 2:14–36)
And afterward, I will pour out My Spirit on all people. Your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
Even on My menservants and maidservants, I will pour out My Spirit in those days.
I will show wonders in the heavens and on the earth, blood and fire and columns \f + \fr 2:30 \ft LXX clouds or billows\f* of smoke.
The sun will be turned to darkness and the moon to blood before the coming of the great and awesome \f + \fr 2:31 \ft Or dreadful; LXX glorious\f* Day of the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

And everyone who calls on the name of the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will be saved;\f + \fr 2:32 \ft Cited in Acts 2:17–21 and Romans 10:13\f* for on Mount Zion and in Jerusalem there will be deliverance, as the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* has promised, among the remnant called by the \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
